title: Question for cheating
body: Had a question and i never seen this EVER but recently. was against a Neeko bot lane but she always had 25% health and takes no / 0 dmg for 4-5 seconds.....??? anyone sxplain this ? even when she came from her base she had 25% health still....????

replies.body: ok makes sense then so she is taking dmg but its not registering the visual of it

Neeko b0rken, patch coming.

Apparently fixing the lulu-neeko-squirrel stat bug just broke her hp display permanently.
